description.raw:
this commit uses some files in sandia_hand (a YAML file with strawman controller gains, and a simple eigengrasp type controller) that will require installing a new sandia_hand deb. Once you do that, then you can command the hand in 1-dof spaces, like this:    

rosrun sandia_hand_teleop simple_grasp_client.py left spherical 0.5

which is kind of neat.
